translations: v．畏缩，退缩：因恐惧、痛苦或其他原因而突然做出避让、退缩的动作。
· He flinched when the doctor gave him an injection.
当医生给他打针时，他畏缩了。

sentences.sentence: She flinched away from the dog.
sentences.translation: 她一下子避开了那条狗。

sentences.sentence: He flinched at the sight of the blood.
He never flinched from facing up to trouble.
sentences.translation: 他敢于面对困难，从不退缩。
